question: [File: aptos-core/aptos-move/block-executor/src/combinatorial_tests/bencher.rs] [Function: BencherState::with_universe()] [TestRunner determinism] TestRunner::default() uses random seed - can this cause non-reproducible test failures that hide real bugs? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/block-executor/src/combinatorial_tests/bencher.rs] [Function: Bencher::bench()] [Strategy reuse] key_strategy is used multiple times in vec() - can this cause the same keys to be generated repeatedly, missing transaction conflicts? (Medium)
